Language.name: Egg Timer
Language.description: The following in app is a timer that will help you to know how you want your egg. Either soft, medium or hard. Soft = 5 min Medium = 7 min Hard = 12min

Language.name: Xylophone
Language.description: Xylophone Game: It was created using the program Xcode in the language Swift. The UI interface was created with view controler Scene and the sounds were connected with IBActions

Language.name: Calculator App
Language.description: The Calculator App is an app to perform basic mathematic operations.
